content.raw:
I agree; I don't want to throw an error. I guess for the Parallel function, it could go either way and we should just document its behavior for degenerate cases.

For the Collinear function, though, it would be nice to give the same result when giving a point (Vector2d) or a degenerate line segment constructed from two instances of that same point. I'm working on an update to the test.
